alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Fulton; Izard; Marion; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 3:20AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Stone, northeastern Searcy, Izard, southeastern Marion, Fulton and Baxter Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 320 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lion Hill to Culp to Mountain View. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Mountain View... Melbourne... Salem in Fulton County... Horseshoe Bend... Gassville... Calico Rock... Oxford... Norfork... Salesville... Viola... Pineville... Briarcliff... Franklin... Arkawana... Bexar... Flint Springs... Ott... Sturkie... Lone Star... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Fulton; Izard; Marion; Stone
